mil7.7.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cittakadharakummassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.3:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, cittakadharakummo udakabhayā udakaṃ parivajjetvā vicarati, tāya ca pana udakaṃ parivajjanāya āyunā na parihāyati;
mil7.7.3:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pamāde bhayadassāvinā bhavitabbaṃ, appamāde guṇavisesadassāvinā.
mil7.7.3:5.4: Tāya ca pana bhayadassāvitāya na parihāyati sāmaññā, nibbānassa santike upeti.
mil7.7.3:5.5: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cittakadharakummassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
